__comment: Values prepended by __ are comments to actual values, without __ on the beginning
__service.json: This config file contains sensitive information, that can be overriden by enviroment values - https://github.com/mykabam/kabam#enviroment.
__hostUrl: The canonical url of this host - for example, http://mykabam.herokuapp.com, if set to false, it is quessed from http://'+os.hostname()+'/
__secret: salf for encrypting sessions, if left to false, session salt generated pseudo randomly (not recommended!)
__emailConfig: Configuration for SMTP server for sending email. For now only the gmail is supported. Example - 'mymail@gmail.com:mypassword'
__GITHUB_CLIENT: Parameters for setting oAUTH authorization for github. If both are false, github authorization is disabled. More information - https://github.com/settings/applications/new
__TWITTER_CONSUMER: Parameters for setting oAUTH authorization for twitter. If both are false, github authorization is disabled. More information - https://dev.twitter.com/apps
__FACEBOOK_APP: Parameters for setting oAUTH authorization for facebook. If both are false, github authorization is disabled. More information - http://developers.facebook.com/
